Name.label: Autosomal dominant distal hereditary motor neuropathy

TextSection.Contents: Distal hereditary motor neuropathy type 1 is a rare neuromuscular disease characterized by slowly-progressive lower limb muscular weakness and atrophy, without sensory impairment. Additional clinical features may include pes cavus, hammertoe and increased muscle tone.

Name.label: E (exact mapping (the terms and the concepts are equivalent))

Synonym.label: Autosomal dominant distal juvenile spinal muscular atrophy type 1
